feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.48.4
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • fix(pipedrive): add api version for webhook (#7163) @kishanprmr
  • feat(ethereum name service): List ENS Domains action (#6955) @reemayoush

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: make sure all flows are published before pushing to git (#7167) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(data-selector): show child properties when searching for a step name (#7166) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add reemayoush as a contributor for plugin (#7162) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @reemayoush

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.48.6

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.48.7
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat: personal AI, TrueLayer, Mailchain, anyhook graphql/websocket pieces (#7164) @kishanprmr
  • feat(wedof): updating wedof piece (#7181) @obenazouz-wedof

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: allow for getting piece metadata with API key and project ID (#7207) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: disable platform admin from being deactivated (#7189) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @obenazouz-wedof

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.49.0
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(http-oauth2): add http request piece with oauth2 (#7077) @mhshiba
  • feat(returning-ai): send message action (#7069) @mg-wunna
  • fix(facebook-leads): add payload verification (#7177) @kishanprmr
  • fix(google-drive): add team drive support for new folder trigger (#7194) @kishanprmr
  • fix(jira-cloud): fix assignee field update action (#7196) @kishanprmr
  • feat(google-gemini): add gemini 2.0 flash models (#7212) @kishanprmr
  • feat(lusha): custom API call, enrich/search actions (#7204) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat(slack): simulate triggers instead of using sample data (#7170) @AdamSelene

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: hide wait for approval step in pieces selector and handle adding steps (#7226) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: check if project were soft deleted in webhooks (#7214) @abuaboud
  • fix: fallback from S3 to DB when S3 fails to save a file (#7197) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(oauth2): change code challenge to 43 char (#7206) @briceflaceliere

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: enhance ux for create todo action (#7191) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: improve logo visuals in the sidebar (#7215) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add mg-wunna as a contributor for plugin (#7213) @allcontributors
  • docs: add briceflaceliere as a contributor for security (#7210) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • Removed all references to the public schema in migrations (#7211) @jasonfill
  • fix: broken community test (#7209) @abuaboud
  • cleanup: upgrade deps (#7199) @abuaboud
  • refactor: upgrade axios from 1.8.2 to 1.8.3 (#7193) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AdamSelene, @Kevinyu-alan, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @briceflaceliere, @hazemadelkhalel, @jasonfill, @kishanprmr, @mg-wunna and @mhshiba
